dark-entry.speaker: {player}
dark-entry.text: You step into the dark...@ the water grows colder.@ Even your heartbeat sounds distant.

dark-deeper.speaker: {player}
dark-deeper.text: No light follows you.@ The world folds into ink.@ Something stirs—close, slow, and hungry.

dark-turnback.speaker: {player}
dark-turnback.text: You try to turn around, but the dark presses tighter.@ The current doesn't care which way you swim.

dark-end1.speaker: {player}
dark-end1.text: A whisper brushes past your ear:@ "No flame... no glow... you were not ready."

dark-end1.speaker: {player}
dark-end1.text: Something cold coils around your wrist.@ You don't feel fear—only stillness.@ Then nothing.

dark-end1.speaker: {player}
dark-end1.text: [You were lost to the dark. Find a glowing item before entering again.]

dark-end2.speaker: {player}
dark-end2.text: You swim until the pressure crushes thought.@ The dark doesn't swallow you—it just forgets you ever were.

dark-end2.speaker: {player}
dark-end2.text: [The depths consume you. You need a light to survive here.]
